title: Megan Fox shares rare family photo from Disneyland and jokes about struggle for one good group snap
text:
Mothers everywhere can relate to her struggle.

And on Saturday, Megan Fox enjoyed a family trip to Disneyland with husband Brian Austin Green, 46, and their three children.

The 33-year-old took to Instagram to share several snaps from their outing, including the lengths it takes to get just one good family photo.

Weekend trip: On Saturday, Megan Fox, 33, enjoyed a family trip to Disneyland with husband Brian Austin Green, 46, and their three children; Noah, seven, Bodhi, five, and Journey, three

'Halloween at @disneyland is always the most fun but can I get ONE family photo where everyone is looking at the camera and making a semi normal face ??,' questioned the actress, as she hashtagged the Most Magical Place on earth.

In the series of snaps, Megan was dressed casually in a black sweater and distressed jeans, while Brian was styled similarly to his wife in a T-shirt and light wash denim slacks with weathered elements.

The couple's sons, Noah, seven, Bodhi, five, and Journey, three, were dressed as a witch and dinosaur, among others.

Not seen with the family was Brian's oldest son Kassius, 17, whom he shares with ex-girlfriend Vanessa Marcil.

Her style: In the series of snaps, Megan was dressed casually in a black sweater and distressed jeans, while Brian was styled similarly to his wife in a T-shirt and light wash, distressed denim

Megan is one of the most stunning actresses in Hollywood, having landed her first role in 2001 as a teenager.

With her piercing good looks, the talented beauty has often been cast as the mean or hot girl, or a combination of both.

In a recent interview with Entertainment Tonight, the actress recalled her most recent press tour in 2016, which happened right before she turned 30.

'I was pregnant with my third son and I was turning 30. I was on a mini press tour for Ninja Turtles and every male journalist that came in was like, "What plans do you have for your future? Because you've always been the sexy girl, but now you're 30." And I remember the second day, I was kind of yelling at people. I was like, "I don't even f****** have wrinkles in my forehead yet! But I'm supposed to hang it up and not be an actor anymore because I'm 30? F*** you!,"' she began.

'So that was my most recent experience, and it was quite similar. There was no sort of respect that had come from the Me Too movement and this idea that we should respect women and not focus so much on how they look. I haven't experienced it yet, but it's not to say that it hasn't happened. I just haven't been doing enough interviews, maybe?'

Playing dress-up: The couple's sons were dressed as a witch and dinosaur, among others

Up next for busy mom Megan is three starring film roles.

The actress will join Gerard Butler, Ellen Page and Kate Winslet as Princess Leilani for the animated film, Naya Legend of the Golden Dolphin.

Megan will work alongside Josh Duhamel in the family drama, Think Like a Dog, and Oscar Isaac, Andy Garcia and Lucy Hale in the comedic drama, Big Gold Brick.
description: Mothers everywhere can relate to her struggle. And on Saturday, the 33-year-old actress enjoyed a family trip to Disneyland with husband Brian Austin Green, 46, and their three boys.
